info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 21 at 1:34PM EDT until June 22 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington VT
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Heat Advisory, heat index values up to 98 expected. For the Extreme Heat Warning, dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 107 expected.
* WHERE...In New York, Eastern Essex County. In Vermont, Western Addison County.
* WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, from 11 AM to 8 PM EDT Sunday. For the Extreme Heat Warning, from 11 AM Monday to 8 PM EDT Tuesday.
* IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during extreme heat and high humidity events. Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction:
Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
Do not leave young children and pets in unattended vehicles. Car interiors will reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.
Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.

parameter.value: HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM EDT SUNDAY... ...EXTREME HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 8 PM EDT TUESDAY
